about_the_game:
Insert-Rich-Family-Name is a text-based interactive mystery novel that lets you live the life of a billionaire and decide your own fate. With captivating storylines, unique characters, and multiple paths to take, this choose-your-own-adventure game will have you hooked from the first chapter.



• Play as woman, man, or non-binary; gay, straight, bi, ace.
• Customized your character.
• Show unwavering support for your family and stand by them through thick and thin, or choose to engage in sibling rivalry and betray anyone who stands in your way.
• Spend your money on frivolous things, make poor life decisions, or start planning.
• Choose to pursue a forbidden romance with your bodyguard, the detective who's always one step ahead, the trusted family lawyer, or a secret love interest that's been hiding in plain sight.

Embark on this thrilling ride as you clutch your pearls and flaunt your diamonds, but beware of the sharp knives and watch out for the blood stains that may follow.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes content that deals with mature topics and may not be appropriate for all audiences. Characters are depicted drinking and making use of tobacco and alcohol. Optional Sex scenes, occasional description of nudity, sexual content, and sexual acts. It also includes sexual stimulation and sex-related language.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Insert Rich Family Name

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: As one of the surviving members of a wealthy family, navigate a treacherous web of lies, deceit, and suspicion to identify the killer and claim your inheritance. But with a killer on the loose, you must be careful not to become the next victim.
